description:
Manages a network peering within GCE. For more information see
[the official documentation](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/vpc/vpc-peering)
and
[API](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/reference/latest/networks).

-> Both network must create a peering with each other for the peering
to be functional.

~> Subnets IP ranges across peered VPC networks cannot overlap.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ExportCustomRoutes.description: Whether to export the custom routes to the peer network. Defaults to `false`.

ImportCustomRoutes.description: Whether to export the custom routes from the peer network. Defaults to `false`.

Network.description: The primary network of the peering.

PeerNetwork.description:
The peer network in the peering. The peer network
may belong to a different project.
